dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.welcome: Welcome to your Tariff Management Dashboard

workflow.guidance: Get the best results by following our guided workflow
workflow.stepByStepDesc: Begin with the Cost Calculator to analyze your current situation, then follow each step for optimal results. Each module builds on the previous one.
workflow.comprehensiveJourney: While you can use individual modules, the best results come from following the complete workflow - each step builds on the insights from the previous one to create a comprehensive view of your business.
workflow.flexibilityNote: Each module can be used independently, but following the complete sequence provides the most comprehensive insights for your business.
workflow.journeyDescription: Transform your trade operations with our integrated suite of tools. Begin with the Cost Calculator below and follow the guided workflow for best results.

dataStatus.title: Data Status
dataStatus.cachedDesc: Showing the most recent available trade data. Your analysis remains accurate.
dataStatus.fallbackNotice: Currently using cached trade data. Your analysis accuracy is maintained.

modules.fileImportDesc: Upload and analyze your product data to calculate tariff impacts and potential cost savings.
modules.tariffAnalysisDesc: Deep dive into tariff impacts with advanced analytics and scenario modeling.
modules.supplierDiversificationDesc: Identify alternative suppliers and reduce supply chain risks through diversification.
modules.supplyChainPlanningDesc: Optimize your supply chain with predictive analytics and strategic planning tools.
modules.workforcePlanningDesc: Plan workforce adjustments based on trade impact analysis and business projections.
modules.alertsSetupDesc: Set up intelligent alerts for tariff changes, supply chain disruptions, and opportunities.
modules.aiRecommendationsDesc: Get personalized recommendations powered by AI to optimize your trade strategy.
modules.completeDesc: Congratulations! You've completed the full tariff management workflow.

costCalculator.title: Cost Calculator
costCalculator.subtitle: Analyze tariff impact on your products

fileUpload.title: Upload File
fileUpload.description: Upload your CSV, XLSX or PDF file with product data
fileUpload.dragDrop: Drag and drop your file here, or click to select

summary.noData: No data available. Please upload a file to begin analysis.
